name: COINDEPO
description: CoinDepo is a decentralized finance platform that merges high-yield deposit accounts with instant crypto lending, giving users the chance to earn passive income while maintaining liquidity. By depositing cryptocurrencies or stablecoins, users can earn up to 24% APR with daily compounding and no strict lock-up requirements, making the product flexible compared to traditional staking. At the heart of the ecosystem is the COINDEPO token (CDP), which supports platform rewards, governance opportunities, and a unique charitable component, as 3% of the total supply is automatically allocated to social causes through its smart contract. This combination positions CoinDepo as both a profit-oriented and socially responsible project within the DeFi industry.
